Package model

Class GameData

java.lang.Object
model.Observable
model.GameData
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GameData
extends Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
This class is a wrapper class containing the elements and the current states of the game
See Also:
